name: Delivery Cat
description:
Delivery Cat is an action game in which you will embody a cat that has to deliver shipping packages in it’s bubble at the highest possible height, which makes it a very dynamic and visually pleasing game. You will have to situate from left to right to avoid the obstacles and enemies that will appear on your way. Make sure your packages reach their destination!

Characteristics:
- You have six amazing worlds to explore! Send packages from below the earth, traveling the sea, through a castle and even up to outer space!
- You can choose between ten different cats for your adventure, some of them with their own customized bubble!
- Compete in the Worldwide Ranking! You can see the ones who have made it the furthest in each world and appear in the ranking internationally!
- Monthly updates with new content, more cats, bubbles and worlds

Important warning to parents:
This game contains optional elements that can be purchased with actual money.
